scripts.build: npm -w backend run build || echo no backend build && npm -w frontend run build
scripts.dev: npm run prisma:generate && concurrently -n backend,frontend,bridge -c blue,green,magenta "npm run start:dev -w backend" "npm:dev -w frontend"
scripts.start: concurrently -n backend,frontend,bridge -c blue,green,magenta "npm:start -w backend" "npm:start -w frontend" "npm:start -w biometric-bridge"
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.prisma:migrate:dev: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:migrate:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.prisma:migrate:status: cd backend && npx prisma migrate status
scripts.prisma:db:push: cd backend && npx prisma db push
scripts.prisma:db:pull: cd backend && npx prisma db pull
scripts.prisma:db:seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.dev:backend: npm -w backend run generate && npm -w backend run start:dev
scripts.build:backend: npm -w backend run build || echo no backend build
scripts.test: npm -w frontend run test && echo Backend has no tests configured
